name: misunderstanding
content:

B2 [ C or U ] an occasion when someone does not understand something correctly: There must be some misunderstanding. I never asked for these chairs to be delivered. His ridiculous comments showed a complete misunderstanding of the situation.
[ C ] informal a disagreement, argument, or fight: often humorous "How did you get your black eye?" "Oh, I had a little misunderstanding with someone at the football match."
